data.name: Doom & Destiny Worlds - Unbreakable
data.detailed_description: Unbreakable is the first DLC of Doom & Destiny Worlds. It includes a new set of Weapons and Armors blueprints, as well as the much requested Unbreakable Mode. Starting a new game with the mode enabled will turn off weapon/armor wear while applying some simple balancing changes. It will also disable the loss of equipment when being defeated (bag content still needs to be recovered).
data.about_the_game: Unbreakable is the first DLC of Doom & Destiny Worlds. It includes a new set of Weapons and Armors blueprints, as well as the much requested Unbreakable Mode. Starting a new game with the mode enabled will turn off weapon/armor wear while applying some simple balancing changes. It will also disable the loss of equipment when being defeated (bag content still needs to be recovered).
data.short_description: The Unbreakable DLC features a new set of Weapons and Armors, and allows you to start a game with the Unbreakable modifier. This will turn off equipment wear and apply some balancing to compensate.
data.supported_languages: English, Italian, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Portuguese, Spanish - Latin America

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Graphics: Dedicated graphic with at least 512 MB Ram
  • Storage: 1000 MB available space
